document.full_text: a hearing ended after three days of testimony in the trial of eugenio vides casanova, a retired general from el salvador accused of participating in torture there during the civil war in the 1980s.
document.title: south: florida: general's deportation hearing ends
lines_and_colors: a hearing ended after three days of testimony in the trial of eugenio vides casanova, a retired general from el salvador accused of participating in torture there during the civil war in the 1980s.
